response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its intended use. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, aiming to make it more accessible while still ensuring a fair return for me. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I look forward to potentially welcoming you as the proud owner of this exceptional piece.", "product_price": 750000}
